Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Ad-hoc referee per le seguenti riviste: • Journal of Finance; • Journal of Business Venturing; • Journal of Banking and Finance; • Journal of Empirical Finance; • The Review of Finance; • Corporate Governance: an International Review; • European Accounting Review; • European Financial Management; • Journal of Accounting Auditing and Finance; • Financial Markets and Portfolio Management; • Journal of Applied Statistics; • Small Business Economics; • Journal of Business, Finance and Accounting; • Journal of Financial Management, Markets and Institutions; • Quarterly review of Economics and Finance.

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: PARTECIPAZIONE A CONVEGNI INTERNAZIONALI COME RELATORE 2016 • American Accounting Association Annual Conference, New York; Financial Management Association Las Vegas; Financial Management Association European Conference Helsinki; Multinational Finance Society Annual Conference Stockholm 2015 • American Accounting Association Annual Conference, Chicago; Financial Management Association Annual Conference Orlando; Applied Finance Conference New York, European Financial Management Association 2015 Amsterdam. 2014 • NBER Summer Institute, Cambridge, MA; Financial Management Association Tokyo; Multinational Finance Society Annual Conference Prague; Applied Finance Conference New York, European Financial Management Association 2014 Rome. 2013 • NBER Summer Institute, Cambridge, MA; Stevens Institute of Technology, Howe School of Management invited faculty seminar; Financial Management Association Chicago; Financial Management Association Europe, Luxembourg; European Accounting Association Conference, Paris. 2012 • Argentum Private Equity Symposium, Bergen; European Financial Management Association 2012, Barcelona; Financial Engineering and Banking Society 2012, London. 2011 • Financial Management Association, Denver (2 papers); International Finance and Banking Society 2011 conference, Rome; European Financial Management Association, Braga. 2010 • International corporate finance and governance conference Twente (NL); 8th EUOROFIDAI-AFFI International Paris Finance Meeting; European Winter Finance, Andermatt; European Financial Management Symposium 2010, Montreal; International Risck Management Conference Florence 2010; Law, Ethics and Finance Conference Toronto; 2009 • Forecasting Financial Markets Luxembourg; International Risk Management Conference Venice; European Financial Management Association Milan; Financial Management Association Reno. 2008 • Financial Management Association Dallas; Financial Management Association-Asian conference Yokohama; AFFI conference Lilles; International Risk Management Conference Florence; European Financial Management Association Athens (2 papers); The Swiss Society for Financial Market Research, Zurich. 2007 • European Financial Management Association Wien (2 papers); 6th International Middle Eastern Economic Association Conference, Dubai. 2006 • CRSP-Center for Research in Security Prices Forum Chicago; 4th Portuguese Finance Network Conference, Oporto; The 30th Journal of Banking and Finance Conference, Beijing, China; 2005 • Financial Management Association -Asian Conference, Kuala Lumpur, European Financial Management Association Milan; 25th International Symposium on Forecasting, San Antonio; The Academy of Entrepreneurial Finance, Laredo. 2004 • CNR, Macerata, Italy 2003 • Harvard University-Alumni Seminar, Cambridge; Kiel Economics workshop, Kiel. 2002 • Ente Einaudi and Bank of Italy, Rome; Midwest Finance Association Conference–Memphis, USA 2001 • 14th AFBC Sydney.

RELATORE INVITATO (INVITED SPEAKER) 2016 • Catholic University – Busch School of Business,Washington (Faculty seminar); Maastrich School of Business (Faculty seminar); Verona University (Faculty seminar); Italian Corporate Finance Association (Invited presentation); Bocconi University (Faculty seminar) 2014 • Argentum Private Equity Symposium (keynote speaker and panelist), Bergen; Schulich School of Business (Faculty seminar); Bloomberg conference Financial Markets, Zagreb School of Economics (Keynote panelist). 2013 • NYU Pollack Center (invited presentation), New York, NY; Giessen University Conference on “Communication in Capital Markets” (Keynote Speaker); Luxembourg School of Finance (invited seminar). 2012 • Bloomberg conference on the financial crisis, Zagreb School of Economics (Keynote panelist); SUNY at Buffalo (Invited Department Seminar). 2011 • Financing Innovation Conference, The George Washington University, Washington DC (Invited Speaker); Hofstra University, New York (Invited Department Seminar). 2009 • NYU Pollack Center for Law and Finance Spring and Fall (2XInvited seminar); Columbia University, Global China Connection Roundtable (Invited Panelist)
MEMBRO DEL COMITATO ORGANIZZATORE DI CONVEGNI Midwest Finance Association Organizing committee 2014,2015,2016

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: PREMI ALLA RICERCA June 2015: Amsterdam, European Financial Management Association Conference Best paper award (Runner up) May 2014: Tokyo, Financial Management Association Conference Best paper award (Runner up)
AFFILIAZIONI American Finance Association, Financial Management Association, European Finance Association.
GRANTS • Innovation & Entrepreneurship Fellowship, Stevens Institute of Technology. Importo finanziato: 120,000 USD • American Finance Association Travel Award. Importo finanziato: 5,000 USD

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Docente incaricato del corso :Corporate Finance, PhD in Business Administration and Management , Universita' Bocconi. 2004 and 2005 (corso in inglese).
Membro del collegio docenti PhD in Finanza Universita' Bocconi
Membro del collegio dei docenti PhD in Management, Stevens Institute of Technology School of Business

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Visiting Associate Professor NYU Stern School of Business (Department of Finance)
Visiting Associate Professor NYU Stern School of Business (Department of Finance)

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Membrod el comitato scientifico della Divisione Ricerca presso SDA Bocconi
Membro del comitato scientifico AXA Research Fund che ha distribuito 100 milioni di euro di fondi di ricerca in cinque tornate annuali
